# index-tts-lora [‰∏≠ÊñáÁâàÊú¨](https://github.com/asr-pub/index-tts-lora/blob/main/README_zh.md) | [English Version](https://github.com/asr-pub/index-tts-lora/blob/main/README.md) This project is based on Bilibili's [index-tts](https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts), providing **LoRA fine-tuning** solutions for both **single-speaker and multi-speaker** setups. It aims to enhance **prosody and naturalness** in high-quality speaker audio synthesis. ### Training & Inference

RowTranslations.originContent: This project is based on Bilibili's [index-tts](https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts), providing **LoRA fine-tuning** solutions for both **single-speaker and multi-speaker** setups. It aims to enhance **prosody and naturalness** in high-quality speaker audio synthesis.

Content: #### 1. Audio token and speaker condition extraction

RowTranslations.originContent: #### 1. Audio token and speaker condition extraction

Content:
```shell
# Extract tokens and speaker conditions
python tools/extract_codec.py --audio_list ${audio_list} --extract_condition

# audio_list format: audio_path + transcript, separated by \t
/path/to/audio.wav Â∞èÊúãÂèã‰ª¨ÔºåÂ§ßÂÆ∂Â•ΩÔºåÊàëÊòØÂáØÂèîÔºå‰ªäÂ§©Êàë‰ª¨ËÆ≤‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈæüÂÖîËµõË∑ëÁöÑÊïÖ‰∫ã„ÄÇ
```

Content: ### Fine-tuning Results This experiment uses **Chinese audio data** from *Kai Shu Tells Stories*, with a total duration of **\~30 minutes** and **270 audio clips**. The dataset is split into **244 training samples** and **26 validation samples**. Note: Transcripts were generated automatically via ASR and punctuation models, without manual correction, so some errors are expected. Example training sample, `‰ªñ‰∏ä‰∫ÜÈ©¨ËΩ¶ÔºåÊù•Âà∞‰∫ÜÁöáÂÆ´‰πã‰∏≠„ÄÇ`Ôºö[kaishu_train_01.wav](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/22354621/kaishu_train_01.wav) #### 1. Model Evaluation For details of the evaluation set, see: [2025 Benchmark of Mainstream TTS Models: Who Is the Best Voice Synthesis Solution?](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/5z_aRKQG3OIv7fnSdxegqQ) ### Acknowledgements [index-tts](https://github.com/index-tts/index-tts) [finetune-index-tts](https://github.com/yrom/finetune-index-tts)

RowTranslations.originContent: This experiment uses **Chinese audio data** from *Kai Shu Tells Stories*, with a total duration of **\~30 minutes** and **270 audio clips**.
The dataset is split into **244 training samples** and **26 validation samples**.
Note: Transcripts were generated automatically via ASR and punctuation models, without manual correction, so some errors are expected.
